describe: Venezuela, officially known as the Bolivarian Republic of Venezuela, is a country on the northern coast of South America. It is known for its diverse natural attractions, including the Andes mountains, the Amazon Basin rainforest, extensive plains, and the Caribbean coast.

cities.name: üèù Caracas
cities.geographical_location: Located in the northern part of the country, nestled in a valley of the Venezuelan coastal mountain range.
cities.climate: Tropical savanna climate with a distinct wet and dry season.

cities.name: üåÜ Maracaibo
cities.geographical_location: Situated in the northwest of Venezuela, on the western shore of the strait that connects Lake Maracaibo to the Gulf of Venezuela.
cities.climate: Hot semi-arid climate with high temperatures year-round.
popular_attractions: Basilica of Our Lady of Chiquinquir√°

cities.name: üèî M√©rida
cities.geographical_location: Located in the Andean region of Venezuela, surrounded by mountains.
cities.climate: Mild and temperate climate, cooler than most of Venezuela due to its elevation.

cities.name: üèù Isla Margarita
cities.geographical_location: An island in the Caribbean Sea, part of the Nueva Esparta state.
cities.climate: Tropical climate with warm temperatures and a dry season.
popular_attractions: Castillo de San Carlos de Borromeo
Parque Nacional Laguna de La Restinga
